By RPGProgrammer on Friday, January 21, 2005 - 06:50 pm:

Here's the dirt on some interesting rare monsters:

Key: LS: Lifespan GR: Guts regen LT: Life type (Refer to the "Monster Lifespans, The Real Scoop!" topic)

Silver Suezo,(Suezo/???),2,3,4,3,2,3 LS:430 LP:0
Gold Suezo,(Suezo/???),2,3,5,4,2,2 LS:450 LP:1
Galaxy,(Monol/???),2,3,4,3,1,4 LS:410 GR:16 LP:1
KungFu Hare,(Hare/???),3,5,1,3,5,1 LS:420 GR:15 LP:0
Bloodshed,(Joker/???),3,3,4,5,2,2 LS:410 GR:13 LP:0
Mermaid,(Undine/???),3,1,4,5,4,2 LS:420 GR:9 LP:3
Watermelony,(Ducken/???),3,3,3,4,5,1 LS:420 GR:8 LP:3

I'll try to do as many of these as possible.
